Literature.Title: Biocombinatorial Synthesis of Novel Lipopeptides by COM Domain-Mediated Reprogramming of the Plipastatin NRPS Complex.
Literature.Author: Liu H, Gao L, Han J, Ma Z, Lu Z, Dai C, Zhang C, Bie X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Rhizopus stolonifer AS3.2336(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Aspergillus ochraceus CICC 2050(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Penicillium chrysogenum AS3.4356(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Aspergillus flavus(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli AS1.487(MIC=250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus GIM 1.178(MIC=500µg/ml)
